text: IRM 10.8.20 is obsolete. This obsoletes all versions of IRM 10.8.20.

All controls from this IRM are obsolete. The following controls that remain effective have been merged into IRM 10.8.15 Information Technology (IT) Security, General Platform Operating System Security Policy, or are already addressed in another IRM (and are still there) as speciﬁed.
10.8.20.3.1.1.1 Account Creation: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.1.
10.8.20.3.1.2 Access Enforcement: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.2.
10.8.20.3.1.3 Least Privilege: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.3.
10.8.20.3.1.4 Unsuccessful Logon Attempts: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.4.
10.8.20.3.1.5 System Use Notiﬁcation: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.5.
10.8.20.3.1.6 Concurrent Session Control: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.6.
10.8.20.3.1.7 Session Lock: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.7.
10.8.20.3.1.8 Session Termination: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.8.
10.8.20.3.1.9 Remote Access: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.1.9.
10.8.20.3.1.11 Service Accounts: The material related to this section has been moved to Exhibit

ActiveX, Java, Mobile Code: The material related to this section has been

10.8.20.3.5.1 DHCP Servers: The material related to this section has been moved to IRM Exhibit
Conﬁguration Change Control: The material related to this section is obsolete as has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.5.1.
Access Restrictions for Change: The material related to this section is obsolete as has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.5.2.
10.8.20.3.5.4 Conﬁguration Settings: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.5.3 and 10.8.15.3.16.5.
Identiﬁcation and Authentication (Organizational Users): The material related to this is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.7.1.
10.8.20.3.7.3 Identiﬁer Management: The material related to this section is obsolete as has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15.3.7.3.

Exhibit 10.8.20-2 Glossary and Acronyms: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM 10.8.15-2.
Exhibit 10.8.20-3 References: The material related to this section is obsolete as information has been incorporated into IRM Exhibit 10.8.15-3
This obsoletes IRM 10.8.20, dated June 27, 2018 and all versions are now obsolete.
All Operating Divisions and Functions, and the Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration (TIGTA).
